website_summaries.verdict: A pharmacist-recommended supplement that promotes healthy HDL cholesterol and lower LDL cholesterol.
pros: Contains natural herbs that support a healthy heart
Boasts organic extracts, vitamins, and minerals that help boost the cardiovascular system.Provides an economical supplement in comparison to similar options
cons: Bad taste sometimes makes the capsules tough to swallow

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work!
customer_reviews.text: This doesn't work at least for me. I had my cholesterol checked before and during the use of this product. I was on this product for almost 4 months and not only did my cholesterol go down and actually went up especially the triglycerides. There was no noticeable change in my diet and in fact I went on a fast for 3 weeks of fried foods just a week before the blood test. I would not recommend this product at all. It seems to be a lot of hocus-pocus like a lot of the herbal products.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: awesome!
customer_reviews.text: a++ my blood results yeilded less bad cholesterol after just one month
customer_reviews.author: Catrina E Wanous

customer_reviews.title: Great Product...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this due to running out of my prescription meds for cholesterol and it worked just fine. I was away from a home in one state and was visiting my home in another state. I was away from my home address where my meds were being shipped for over 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says it will do...
customer_reviews.text: Have ordered this product a few times and can honestly say, it does as advertised. Seller shipped on time and package came in perfect condition. Will order again.
customer_reviews.author: AZNorb

customer_reviews.title: Not sure yet
customer_reviews.text: Still taking it daily. Will review again after my upcoming physical and blood tests.
customer_reviews.author: Eyoo

customer_reviews.title: Healthy  Lifestyle
customer_reviews.text: Additional information from my family. Use now and last blood work, of another Rx .... check with your doctor first.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Brown

customer_reviews.title: It Works
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome! Over the last year my cholesterol tests have not been good. I started taking this about 4 months ago and my cholesterol report a week ago was great. Definitely would recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Haines

customer_reviews.title: They're great!
customer_reviews.text: I used to use another heart health supplement, but these have everything at a lower cost. They're great!
customer_reviews.author: J. Lody

customer_reviews.title: Healthy system is a plus!!!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to swallow, holds very well no problem with tolerance. Will see the results shortly on 2nd bootle now and upcoming blood work. So new updated later.
customer_reviews.author: Walter lawson

customer_reviews.title: Waiting on Results
customer_reviews.text: I'm still waiting to see if my cholesterol levels improve after taking the product.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Little pill for big benefits!
customer_reviews.text: I've been monitoring my heart health for over 20 years and I am glad I found this plant-based herbal product. I use it to help support a healthy heart and cholesterol levels and the biggest selling point was that it is pharmacist reviewed and approved. Great for holistic-minded indivduals because it uses red sage, ginseng, and jiaogulan vine. There's also something called RosaEX for a Vitamin C boost. So far I feel great! I'll keep using this.
customer_reviews.author: Uptonia

customer_reviews.title: Dont think its effective at all
customer_reviews.text: I took this pills as directed and finished the whole item ... after that I have my yearly blood work done.. no difference of any kind ..how do we know if it's working?
customer_reviews.author: xyz123

customer_reviews.title: This is the first time I am trying this supplement ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I am trying this supplement and I have not know will it lower my cholesterol. I will continue try it until I have the physical check-up
customer_reviews.author: Sophia Chan

customer_reviews.title: Works for my blood pressure
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product for blood pressure and heart rate control i been struggling with my blood pressure and taking this watched it go down
customer_reviews.author: Tari Unique

customer_reviews.title: Helps heart and circulation.
customer_reviews.text: This helped some of my chest pains and my circulation. I have decided to use aged garlic extract instead, but didn't have a bad experience, other than the taste. I cannot swallow pills so I have to open them, and it tastes horrible. Most won't have that problem though
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Vitamins for the heart!
customer_reviews.text: I call these vitamins for the heart. My mom and I both have cardiovascular disease so I thought I would try them first and if they help I will try on mom. They are easy to swallow and have the right B vitamins and folic acid for a healthy heart. I would caution persons taking blood thinners to check with a physician first because some B vitamins and some supplements can also act as blood thinners. I received these at a discount for an honest review. I like the fact that the contents are specifically geared toward good cardiovascular health.
customer_reviews.author: LadyBlue

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product to maintain heart health.
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent blend of vitamin B6, B12, ginseng, Rosa roxburghii, salvia miltiorrhizs root and other ingredients. The dosage is two capsules per day, so this should last one month. There is no taste or aftertaste. I come from a family with lots of hereditary heart disease, and from my research, these ingredients will support my heart health. I did receive this product at a discount in return for an honest review.
customer_reviews.author: HeatherRae

product_meta.title: HeartOne, Heart Health Supplement for High LDL Cholesterol and High Tryglycerides and Supporting Better HDL Cholesterol, 60 Vegan Capsules, Non GMO, Gluten Free
feature_bullets: The physician formulated HeartONE blend includes Vitamin B6, Folic Acid, Vitamin B12, Gynostemma pentaphyllum, Panax notoginseng, Salvia militiorrhiza extract and RosaEX and AstraGin, patented antioxidant and absorption ingredients
45% ORGANIC | HeartOne contains the highest percentage of organic herbs utilized in any cardiovascular supplement.

60 Vegetarian capsules, 1 Month Supply, NON-GMO, Gluten Free, Manufactured in USA. Note: Customers may receive product with the original packaging or updated packaging design. Product inside remains the same!
